name: Mammoth
description:
Has controller support. If using a controller on web, please click after the game loads to get audio.

Where are I? How do I get out of here?

Climb your way out.

Made for the 32bit Spring Cleaning 2022. Unfortunately didn't have time to make the art more 32bit. I wish I had time to create a unique character for the game.

This game would not have been possible without the great assets available online.

Thanks to Kenney,  Mixamo, and Sidearm Studios for the amazing assets.
